research_objectives:
1. Comparison of German Ströer original horoscopes and davinci
  2. Check aspects regarding various time periods in German texts
research_findings:
Overall German generated horoscopes (as already seen with regard to the EN translations) cannot be distinguished from the Ströer originals (human written) by our test reviewers.
With respect to certain criteria (like "style of writing/tone") the originals were preferred. Generated text are highly likely to match the given topic and tone.
Time periods are rarely realised in the actual texts (with both sources, original and generated). But monthly horoscopes seem to tend to refer to a specific month, as can be seen in texts from both sources.
All in all the data doesn't indicate any reasons why we shouldn't proceed using davinci model with respective prompts to generate horoscopes for daily, weekly and monthly time periods.

  1. List 1 vs. list 4
    1 is significantly better with regards to "readability", which means the original is preferred but on a high level.
  2. List 2 vs. list 5
    davinci produced weekly horoscopes outperform originals significantly with respect to all criteria but "readability" and "grammar" (both very good results)
  3. List 3 vs. list 6
    same picture as in 1 vs. 4 but with a stronger tendency to a better readability in the original
